All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Model representing an application admin.
AdminDB
Firestore helper for operations on the "admins" collection.
AdminDB.AddAdminCallback
Callback for when an Admin is added to the database.
AdminDB.DeleteAdminCallback
Callback for when an Admin is deleted from the database.
AdminDB.GetAdminCallback
Callback for when an Admin is retrieved from the database.
AdminDB.UpdateAdminCallback
Callback for when an Admin is updated in the database.
AreaStats
 
BarType
Type of bottom navigation bar used by the app screens.
BaseTopBottomActivity
Base activity that provides common top/bottom navigation wiring used by entrant screens.
CreateEventPage
Activity for creating a new event.
DecisionFragment
DialogFragment presented to entrant users when they receive an invitation (notification) to accept or decline an event invitation.
DeepLinkRouterActivity
Small helper Activity that routes app-specific deep links to an internal Activity class.
DeepLinkUtil
Utility class for building and handling application deep links.
DevicePrefsManager
Helper to manage a stable device identifier stored in SharedPreferences.
EditEventPage
Fragment used to edit an existing Event.
EditProfileActivity
 
Entrant
Model representing an entrant in the application.
EntrantDB
Firestore helper for operations on the "entrants" collection.
EntrantDB.AddEntrantCallback
Callback for when an Entrant is added to the database.
EntrantDB.DeleteEntrantCallback
Callback for when an Entrant is deleted from the database.
EntrantDB.GetEntrantCallback
Callback for when an Entrant is retrieved from the database.
EntrantDB.NotificationsListener
Callback for when a list of notifications is retrieved from the database.
EntrantDB.PushNotificationCallback
Callback for when a notification is pushed to the database.
EntrantDB.UpdateEntrantCallback
Callback for when an Entrant is updated in the database.
EntrantEventDetails
Activity that displays detailed information for a single Event to an entrant.
EntrantHomeActivity
EntrantHomeActivity displays the home screen for entrants, showing a list of events and allowing navigation to other parts of the app such as the organizer page, scan page, and notifications.
EntrantListArrayAdapter
RecyclerView adapter that displays a list of entrants in a compact item view.
EntrantListArrayAdapter.EntrantViewHolder
ViewHolder for an entrant item.
EntrantNotification
Represents a single in-app notification stored for an entrant.
EntrantNotificationAdapter
Adapter for displaying entrant notifications in a RecyclerView.
EntrantNotificationAdapter.OnAction
Callback interface used by the host to respond to user actions in the list.
EntrantNotificationAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder that lazily locates the message and CTA text views used by different notification layouts.
EntrantNotificationsActivity
Entrant screen: listens to entrants/{deviceId}.notifications and displays them.
EntrantScan
Activity that provides a continuous barcode/QR code scanner for entrants.
Event
Represents an event created in the application.
Event.EntrantLocation
Simple value object to hold an entrant's location when they joined the waitlist.
EventDB
Firestore helper for operations on the "events" collection.
EventDB.AddEventCallback
Callback for when an Event is added to the database.
EventDB.AddToWaitlistCallback
Callback for when a user is added to the waitlist.
EventDB.DeleteEventCallback
Callback for when an Event is deleted from the database.
EventDB.GetEventCallback
Callback for when an Event is retrieved from the database.
EventDB.GetEventsCallback
Callback for when a list of Events is retrieved from the database.
EventDB.RemoveFromWaitlistCallback
Callback for when a user is removed from the waitlist.
EventDB.UpdateEventCallback
Callback for when an Event is updated in the database.
EventRecyclerAdapter
RecyclerView ListAdapter for Event items.
EventRecyclerAdapter.EditEventListener
 
EventRecyclerAdapter.EventCardClickedListener
 
EventRecyclerAdapter.ViewHolder
 
EventState
Represents the lifecycle state of an Event.
FilterEventsDialogFragment
DialogFragment that displays filter controls for the events list.
FilterEventsDialogFragment.FilterListener
Listener invoked when filters are applied or cleared by the user.
FirebaseImageStorageService
A service for interacting with Firebase Cloud Storage to manage entrant profile images and event posters.
GatePrefs
Simple preferences helper to store whether a user record "exists" on the server.
GeoService
 
GeoService.GeoCallback
 
ItemSpacingDecoration
Simple ItemDecoration that adds vertical spacing between items.
ListItemEntrant
Simple model representing a list entry for an entrant.
MainActivity
Developer playground activity used during development to test image uploads, notifications and navigation to various screens.
NotificationType
Enumeration of notification types that can be sent to entrants.
Organizer
Model representing an organizer.
OrganizerDB
Firestore helper for operations on the "organizers" collection.
OrganizerDB.AddOrganizerCallback
Callback for when an Organizer is added to the database.
OrganizerDB.DeleteOrganizerCallback
Callback for when an Organizer is deleted from the database.
OrganizerDB.GetOrganizerCallback
Callback for when an Organizer is retrieved from the database.
OrganizerDB.UpdateOrganizerCallback
Callback for when an Organizer is updated in the database.
OrganizerEventsDataHolder
A singleton holder for organizer events.
OrganizerMainPage
Activity for the organizer main page.
OrganizerManageEvent
OrganizerManageEvent class allows organizers to manage event details, view and manage entrants, and send notifications.
OrganizerWaitListMapActivity
 
ProfileActivity
ProfileActivity displays the user's profile information and allows editing and deletion of the account.
QrCodeFragment
DialogFragment that displays a QR code image for an event and allows the user to download the QR image to their device.
QrUtil
Utility for generating QR code Bitmaps.
SendNotificationDialogFragment
DialogFragment for composing and sending a notification for an event.
SendNotificationDialogFragment.Audience
Audience groups supported by the dialog.
SendNotificationDialogFragment.Listener
Callback used to deliver the composed notification back to the host.
SignUpActivity
Screen used to create a new user account.
SplashActivity
Launcher activity that determines whether the app should route to the sign-up flow or the entrant home experience based on whether a user document exists for the current device.
TestDeepLinkActivity
Minimal test activity used to display all Intent extras for debugging deep links.
User
Represents a general application user.
UserDB
Provides a high-level API for interacting with the "users" collection in Firestore.
UserDB.DeleteCallback
Callback interface for delete operations on a User.
UserDB.ExistsCallback
Callback interface for checking if a user exists in the database.
UserDB.GetUserCallback
Callback interface for when a User is fetched from the database.
UserDB.WriteCallback
Callback interface for write operations (add/update) on a User.
